game.title: The Lost Key
game.objective: Retrieve the lost key from the goblin cave.
game.description: A goblin stole the key to the village gate. Find the cave, defeat the goblin, and retrieve the key.

task.description: Travel north along the river until you reach the Dark Forest. The cave is hidden deep within the forest.
The goblin is a powerful foe, so come prepared. Use caution and watch out for its attacks.

task.objective: Climb to the top of the cave's rock face.
task.description: From there, you'll have a clear view of the goblin's lair. Look for any signs of its entrance or exits.

task.objective: Enter the cave and defeat the goblin boss.
task.description: The goblin boss is a powerful creature, so be prepared for a tough fight. Use your sword and spells to weaken it and emerge victorious.

task.objective: Climb down the cave's rock face and retrieve the key.
task.description: Once you have defeated the goblin boss, search its body for the key.

task.objective: Climb back up the cave's rock face and return the key to the mayor.
task.description: Once you have retrieved the key, head back to the village gate and speak to the mayor.
